snippet.title: DOOM 4 VANILLA - RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
[MIDI BFG DIVISION by Nabernizer]

D4V is a gameplay mod inspired by Doom 2016, made to be compatible with any source-port (or without any of them)

100% vanilla compatible, full of dehacked tricks and with additional features . All under the limitations of the original Doom2.exe!

=== DOWNLOAD LINK: 
https://www.doomworld.com/forum/topic/108725-doom-4-vanilla-dehacked-project/

List of all WADs shown here (in order of appearance)
- Nex Credo
- Khorus Speedy Shit
- Interception
- Scythe
- Doom 64 in Doom 2
- BACULUS
- Moonblood
- Speed of Doom
- Doom 2 (MAP01)
- No Rest for the Living
- Freedoom (MAP07)
- Reverie
